option.name: originalContent
option.value:
#!/bin/zsh
# 依赖问题修复脚本 echo " 开始修复 ProjectOAA 依赖问题..." echo ""
# 检查 Java 是否安装 if ! command -v java &> /dev/null then echo "❌ 未检测到 Java 环境" echo " 正在安装 Java..." brew install openjdk@17
echo "⚙️ 配置 Java 环境变量..." echo 'export JAVA_HOME=/opt/homebrew/opt/openjdk@17' >> ~/.zshrc echo 'export PATH="$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH"' >> ~/.zshrc source ~/.zshrc
echo "✅ Java 安装完成" else echo "✅ Java 已安装: $(java -version 2>&1 | head -n 1)" fi
echo "" echo " 步骤 1/3: 清理构建缓存..." cd /Users/vincent/ProjectOAA ./gradlew clean
echo "" echo " 步骤 2/3: 重新构建项目（触发 KSP 生成代码）..." ./gradlew kspDebugKotlin
echo "" echo "✅ 步骤 3/3: 构建完成！" echo "" echo " 下一步操作：" echo "1. 在 Android Studio 中打开项目" echo "2. 选择 File > Invalidate Caches..." echo "3. 选择 'Invalidate and Restart'" echo "4. 等待 IDE 重启和重新索引" echo "" echo "✨ 修复完成！"

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
#!/bin/zsh
# 依赖问题修复脚本 echo " 开始修复 ProjectOAA 依赖问题..." echo ""
# 检查 Java 是否安装 if ! command -v java &> /dev/null then echo "❌ 未检测到 Java 环境" echo " 正在安装 Java..." brew install openjdk@17
echo "⚙️ 配置 Java 环境变量..." echo 'export JAVA_HOME=/opt/homebrew/opt/openjdk@17' >> ~/.zshrc echo 'export PATH="$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH"' >> ~/.zshrc source ~/.zshrc
echo "✅ Java 安装完成" else echo "✅ Java 已安装: $(java -version 2>&1 | head -n 1)" fi
echo "" echo " 步骤 1/3: 清理构建缓存..." cd /Users/vincent/ProjectOAA ./gradlew clean
echo "" echo " 步骤 2/3: 重新构建项目（触发 KSP 生成代码）..." ./gradlew kspDebugKotlin
echo "" echo "✅ 步骤 3/3: 构建完成！" echo "" echo " 下一步操作：" echo "1. 在 Android Studio 中打开项目" echo "2. 选择 File > Invalidate Caches..." echo "3. 选择 'Invalidate and Restart'" echo "4. 等待 IDE 重启和重新索引" echo "" echo "✨ 修复完成！"
